CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 18, 1953, pg. 2, reads: "Has seen 100 years - Mrs. Lucy Slater of Ben Avon still used the coffee grinder she has had for more than seventy-five years. She prepared her own meals and is really independent.' "
TitMainTitle: Double exposure: Centenarian Lucy Slater seated in chair and holding baby, in domestic interior with stairs in background, possibly her home in Ben Avon; Group portrait of girls in light colored dresses
